title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/speech-synthesis
author: LinOnetwo
name: speech-synthesis
description: Web Speech synthesis (TTS), free and offline
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/speech-synthesis">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/speech-synthesis"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/speech-synthesis/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/speech-synthesis/"/></$button>

It works completely offline.

!! Usage

```tw5
\define text-to-speak() Hello World

<$button>
  Speak Hello World
  <$speech-synthesis-widget text=<<text-to-speak>> />
</$button>

Or

<$button>
  Speak Hello World
  <$speech-synthesis-widget text="Hello World" />
</$button>
```
